verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Here we are,
Gathered as one before the heart of Jesus
Fountain of life,
Fountain of hope for the world
Sacred Heart, filled with the love of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Heart of Jesus we worship You
Heart of Jesus we honour You
May our heart be made one with You.
Fill them with Your love,
The fire of Your love - Sacred Heart.
